semantic_title: Terrorism Cause of Injury Identified by Federal Government (FBI)
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 20. Chapter 20: External Causes of Morbidity > j. Terrorism Guidelines > 1) Cause of injury identified by the Federal Government (FBI) as terrorism

content.full_text: When the cause of an injury is identified by the Federal Government (FBI) as terrorism, the first-listed external cause code should be a code from category Y38, Terrorism. The definition of terrorism employed by the FBI is found at the inclusion note at the beginning of category Y38. Use additional code for place of occurrence (Y92.-). More than one Y38 code may be assigned if the injury is the result of more than one mechanism of terrorism. (Evidence: pg no: 92, L40-L43)
